Did you receive the estimate I put together for you? Please let me know if not so I can resend.

From: Kevin Rose [mailto:rose.kevin87@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, August 30, 2011 2:27 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners - Follow Up
Steve,
I sent an e-mail a few days ago. Did you receive it? It gave some information pertinent to the cash flow prediction sheet and also contained a few questions I had thought up over the weekend.
Also, How'd you do?
-Kevin
On Tue, Aug 30, 2011 at 2:25 PM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote: Kevin,
I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation a few weeks ago. I just got back from vacation this week – if there are any questions you have feel free to email or call me.
Steve
___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
